research.name: Seoul National University
research.position: Research Intern, Visual & Geometric Intelligence Lab
highlights: Researched on stable odometry update with multi-cam LIVO SLAM frameworks

research.name: KAIST Kim Jae-chul Al Graduate School
highlights: Personal research on Graph based Item-to-Item Recommendation System to improve item connectivity

work.name: Republic of Korea Air Force (ROKAF)
work.position: IT Equipment Support Team, Intelligence Information Systems Division
highlights: Maintained internal network systems, including firmware versioning and IP address management for IT infrastructure

industry.name: Dable (Ad-Tech) - Ad-Fatigue Analysis
highlights: Identified linearly decreasing CTR from repeated ad exposures, and proposed optimal replacement timing based on decay trends
Discovered mild fatigue effects from visually similar ads

industry.name: Dable (Ad-Tech) - CTR Prediction Regularization for New Ads
highlights: Proposed a training scheme to mitigate uncertainty in CTR prediction for newly registered ads
Designed a regularization loss using feature-based clustering to emphasize dominant predictors of CTR

industry.name: NEWNEEK (Content Curation) - Multi-Tower Recommendation System Development
highlights: Built a six-tower recommendation model reflecting short/long-term user preferences, item popularity, and timeliness
Implemented personalized re-ranking to match item distributions to user behavior
Designed rule-based logic to address the cold-start problem and introduced controlled randomness to reduce filter bubbles

industry.name: Align AI (Conversational AI) - RAG-based Recommendation System Deploying Knowledge Graphs
industry.summary: Industrial Project with Align AI. Utilized Neo4j and LangChain.
highlights: Constructed user knowledge graphs from dialogue data
Augmented item attributes using LLMs to form item-side knowledge graphs
Developed a recommendation system linking user and item KGs based on node similarity to ensure interpretability

projects.name: Text-to-Music Generation Enhancing Instrumental-Level Controllability
projects.summary: Generative AI Research Project. Advisor: Prof. Jaesik Park.
highlights: Developed an autoregressive music generation pipeline using the AudioLDM2 architecture as a backbone
Proposed a novel noise scheduling method based on DDIM scheduler incorporating a reference latent vector with decaying guidance weight
Integrated instrument-specific LoRAs trained on dedicated datasets to enable timbre control

projects.name: Computer Architecture Simulator Implementation
highlights: Designed and implemented a pipelined CPU with branch prediction (Gshare, perceptron) in Verilog
Developed a multi-level, non-blocking, write-back, inclusive cache in C++

projects.name: Statistical Validation of ESG Survey Data
highlights: Verified construct validity and reliability of ESG survey responses via Exploratory Factor Analysis using SPSS

projects.name: Image Classification with Noisy Labels
highlights: Designed a robust training model structure by co-teaching networks to solve a Kaggle contest hosted by Prof. Jonghyun Choi

projects.name: Reordering Twisted Image Sequences into Coherent Text
highlights: Developed an attention-based sequence model to reorder jumbled image inputs using ordered text labels

projects.name: Illuminance-Adaptive Circuit System
highlights: Designed and prototyped a PCB that automatically adjusts lighting intensity in response to ambient brightness using photoresistors

projects.name: Multi-Robot Tracking Algorithm (SNU College of Engineering Competition)
highlights: Developed a tracking algorithm under map constraints using Arduino-based robots
Implemented and evaluated tracking strategies on a physical model environment

organizations.organization: Growth Hackers, SNU Data-Driven Business Strategy Society
highlights: Participated in data-driven consulting projects in collaboration with DABLE, NEWNEEK, and AlignAl
Extracted actionable insights through statistical modeling and machine learning to support innovative business solutions

organizations.summary: Designed infographics and visual content to support broadcast storytelling and communication
Participated in robotics design and control system development as a member of a student-led engineering club
